means: 给…做预防注射( inoculate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His dogs were inoculated against rabies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的狗注射过狂犬疫苗。

sentence.Network_en: A pedigree pup should have been inoculated against serious diseases before it's sold.
sentence.Network_cn: 纯种狗应该在出售前注射预防严重疾病的针.

sentence.Network_en: Disease can be spread by dirty tools, insects, inoculated soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 疾病也能由不干净的工具, 昆虫, 接种的土壤传播.

PerfectNetExp.abs: inoc inoculation接种inoculated接种的InV Inhibitor Virm Virm(人名)抑制素(一种同种异型免疫球蛋白).
变性铸铁modified cast iron孕育铸铁inoculatedcast iron

but criticism of the move showed how tension has emerged as thousands of children and others considered at risk of complications have waited hours lines to be inoculated .此举引发了强烈批评，显示出形势的紧张程度，因成千上万的儿童和其他被认为可能出现并发症者都要排队数小时等候注射疫苗。
you should be inoculated against infectious diseases ., 你应大预防针防止传染疾病.

list.abs: self infection 自体感染self inoculation 自体接种self mutilation 自伤
prophylactic disinfection 预防性消毒  prophylactic dose 预防量  prophylactic immunization 预防免疫接种  prophylactic inoculation 预防接种  prophylactic measures.
狻裂窟擂秉糊恍洛浞遏旆葩孤葭瞻难拧俾糇憎浏彘暝宕萌西譬迭慧单坷动物接种(Animal inoculation)是最早应用的病毒培养法,在病毒学研究中主要有三方面用途.
接种工具有接种环（inoculating loop）、接种针（inocula-ting needle）、接种钩（inoculating hook）、接种.

entry.tran: 给…免疫接种;给…打预防针
entry.def: To inoculate a person or animal means to inject a weak form of a disease into their body as a way of protecting them against the disease.

example.ex: ...a program to inoculate every child in the state...
example.tran: 为该州所有儿童预防接种的计划

example.ex: His dogs were inoculated against rabies.
example.tran: 他的狗注射过狂犬疫苗。

auth_sentence.content: Jenner subsequently proved that having been inoculated with cowpox Phipps was immune to smallpox.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jenner subsequently proved that having been inoculated with cowpox Phipps was immune to smallpox.
